ActFederal-Provincial Fiscal Arrangements Act
SubjectOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance to enter into an Agreement to Amend the Tax Collection Agreement with the Government of Nova Scotia.
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Finance, on behalf of the Government of Canada, to enter into an agreement to AMEND THE TAX COLLECTION AGREEMENT with the Government of NOVA SCOTIA.
